text.p1: Born in Gran Canaria, I completed my Secondary Education and Baccalaureate at José Arencibia Gil High School. After passing the university entrance exam and being uncertain about my next step, I decided to pursue a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering at the University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. My interest in new technologies and the methodologies applied to everyday situations and scientific purposes inspired this decision.
text.p2: Throughout these years, I have developed a strong passion for learning and growing in various areas, particularly in software development and the adoption of programming best practices.
text.p3: During my final year of studies, I had the opportunity to undertake an internship at Aplicaciones Informáticas Domingo Alonso, the parent company of the Domingo Alonso automotive group. During this experience, I contributed to the development of advanced backend features using modern technologies such as .NET.

studying.title: Studying
studying.text: Engaging in continuous learning and acquiring new skills to stay updated with the latest trends, knowledge and technologies.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
best-practices.text: Always striving to follow best practices in web development. This includes writing clean code and using version control.

software-development.title: Software Development
software-development.text: Interested in the field of software development. Continuously learning and applying new technologies to solve complex problems and improve user experiences.

keep-investigating.title: Keep Investigating
keep-investigating.text: Conducting thorough research to provide high-quality insights and information.

internship.description: Final-year curricular internship at AIDA (Aplicaciones Informáticas Domingo Alonso), as part of the Importer Sales team, contributing to the development of key functionalities.

description.p1: The project consists of the development of a web application for the management of the Domingo Alonso group’s fleet of vehicles. The application will allow the management of the fleet, including functionalities such as vehicle registration, maintenance management, and real-time tracking.
description.p2: The project aims to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of fleet management, providing a modern and user-friendly interface for users.
